eventhub_read_policy_key: create here: https://ms.portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.EventHub | will look like a weird string of garbage
eventhub_namespace: your hub namespace (main name of hub)
cosmos_service_endpoint: Create here: https://ms.portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.DocumentDB | thing you need looks like this -> https://xxxx.documents.azure.com:443/
